name: Star Boba Pearls
description: Fun, star-shaped boba pearls that add a whimsical touch to your beverages. These chewy pearls are perfect for creating a playful and delicious drink experience.

name: Flan Pudding
description: A smooth and creamy custard dessert with a rich caramel topping. A classic treat that's both comforting and indulgent.

name: Mini Miffy Mochi
description: Soft and chewy rice cakes with a sweet red bean filling, inspired by the beloved Miffy character. A delightful snack that's both cute and delicious.
